member.name: P:GTANetworkAPI.Entity.Dimension
member.summary:
Gets or sets the Dimension this is in. This also determines who this is visible to.
Example:
Players in Dimension 0 can only see an when it is in Dimension 0. Entities that are in Dimension 1 are not visible to these Players.

A list of all available window tints:
0: None 1: Pure Black 2: Dark Smoke 3: Light Smoke 4: Stock 5: Limo 6: Green
